feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService
feed.rights: Copyright Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited, 2025. Licensed under Creative Commons BY 4.0.

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain. Rainfall amounts may approach warning criteria within 15 km east of the main divide. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, winds should ease from the south during Wednesday. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Note, winds are easing from the south overnight. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch/Orange Warning has been decreased to Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Minimal. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Rain is expected to turn to snow for a time this morning. 2 to 4 cm may accumulate near the summit of the road with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: A period of snow is expected Wednesday morning and 2 to 4 cm may accumulate about higher levels of the road with lesser amounts down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
